oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Physical Exam and Application for Commission as an Officer in the TSG during World War II
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two typed sheets of paper. The first is a physical examination form for qualification in the Tennessee State Guard. The second is an application for state commission as an officer in the Tennessee State Guard.
These forms are of particular importance given the absence of military records for Tennessee State Guard enlisted men.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tennessee State Guard, 1941-1947
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tennessee. Militia; Tennessee - History, Military; World War, 1939-1945
Militias
